caption.p: Different mechanism of medical properties of medicinal herbs. GSH, glutathione; SOD, superoxide dismutase; CAT, catalase; NO, Nitric oxide; MDA, malondialdehyde; PLA2: Phospholipase A2; PGE2: Prostaglandin-E2; IL-1β, Interleukin-1β; COX-1, Cyclooxygenase-1; iNOS, Inducible nitric oxide synthase.
